mapper.select: select ld.name, ld.brand, ld.model, ob.mount, ld.price, (ob.mount * ld.price) as "totalPrice", from_unixtime( ob.time,'%Y-%d') from order_business ob LEFT JOIN laptop_details ld on ob.laptop_id = ld.id LEFT JOIN user us on ob.user_id = us.id
mapper.insert: insert into order_business (laptop_id, user_id, mount) values (#{laptop_id}, #{user_id}, #{mount})
